titles: An extempore sermon, preached upon malt, by a way of caution to good fellows; at the request of two schollars, / by a lover of ale, out of a hallow [sic] tree.
author: Lover of ale.
Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
notes: Attributed to John Dod by Wing (2nd ed.).
